data.lyric:
[ti:Ain't Easy (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:38 Baby 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Ain't Easy (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:00.10]Lyrics by：Kentrell Gaulden/Thomas Horton/Hagan Lange/Luke Clay
[00:00.21]Pipe that s**t up TnT
[00:23.84]N***a my fit on point uh
[00:25.44]N***a this whip okay
[00:26.81]Hold on calm down YoungBoy
[00:28.37]Make sure I'm straight on stage
[00:29.83]I took the backwards route
[00:31.38]Spent a hundred grand on K's
[00:32.78]Still at all out war 'bout gang
[00:34.36]F**k n***a don't throw no shade uh
[00:36.48]I left the season to comeback with a reason
[00:39.30]I ain't say it was easy yeah ahh
[00:42.59]I through them beans in my bro sold out can't see me
[00:45.27]I could've left him bleedin' yeah ahh
[00:48.29]Whipped out a Birkin bag and took out fifty that's all on yeah
[00:51.41]Hold on slatt business
[00:52.50]Let me check the interest for that corner
[00:54.27]I got hats pendin' checks for all them youngins
[00:56.62]They been on 'em
[00:57.43]B***h it's rack city
[00:58.57]Stack on top of stack and they gon' stone him
[01:00.80]I don't think these n***as want no smoke
[01:02.66]We be all with it
[01:03.86]I can't put no ho' before my bro because they all sneaky
[01:06.83]Out tweakin' late night when we geekin'
[01:08.66]We stuck on our pivot
[01:09.74]I grab the mic you make sure
[01:11.05]That I'm right just for this crowd see me
[01:12.50]N***a my fit on point uh
[01:14.07]N***a this whip okay
[01:15.44]Hold on calm down YoungBoy
[01:16.94]Make sure I'm straight on stage
[01:18.48]I took the backwards route
[01:19.96]Spent a hundred grand on K's
[01:21.44]Still at all out war 'bout gang
[01:23.04]F**k n***a don't throw no shade uh
[01:25.11]I left the season to comeback with a reason
[01:27.92]I ain't say it was easy yeah ahh
[01:31.25]I through them beans in my bro sold out can't see me
[01:34.07]I could've left him bleedin' yeah ahh
[01:37.19]I just put one up he shoot he scores
[01:39.92]I just need get me a love to keep these h*es right front my door
[01:42.95]I just took my ho back insides 'til they was gone n***a yeah yeah
[01:46.30]They gon' hate on us until we gone that what 10 said
[01:49.15]I ain't look at her not once just sang my song n***a
[01:52.08]Bought her a Rolex got her a flight back sent her home yeah
[01:54.82]She can't get her a text back post my next b***h
[01:56.57]Turn off the phone yeah
[01:58.18]Take out your phone and post my neck b***h focus on it yeah
[02:01.51]I left the season to comeback with a reason
[02:04.32]I ain't say it was easy yeah ahh
[02:07.57]I through them beans in my bro sold out can't see me
[02:10.48]I could've left him bleedin' yeah ahh
data.trans:
[ti:Ain't Easy (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:38 Baby 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.10]//
[00:00.21]TnTXD制作
[00:23.84]兄弟 我的打扮很不错
[00:25.44]兄弟 这辆豪车还可以
[00:26.81]等一等 冷静点 YoungBoy
[00:28.37]确保我在舞台上尽情表演
[00:29.83]我走了与常人相反的路
[00:31.38]花了十万块买珠宝
[00:32.78]依然在街头与人斗争
[00:34.36]混蛋 不要给我含沙射影
[00:36.48]我离开这里 又霸气回归
[00:39.30]我不会说这一切很容易
[00:42.59]我稍微动动脑筋 我兄弟的货就马上卖光 谁都看不到我
[00:45.27]我本来可以让他自生自灭
[00:48.29]背着铂金包 掏出五万块 那是她自己的东西
[00:51.41]等一下 兄弟之间的事情
[00:52.50]让我看看我能得到多少收入
[00:54.27]我还有事情要处理 为那些年轻人都准备了钱
[00:56.62]他们都在努力打拼
[00:57.43]碧池 这是金钱之城
[00:58.57]钞票越积越多 他们会攻击他
[01:00.80]我觉得这些人不会自找麻烦
[01:02.66]我们可是真资格的
[01:03.86]女人始终不如我的兄弟重要 因为女人太狡猾了
[01:06.83]在外狂欢 深夜时分 我们兴奋不已
[01:08.66]我们坚持做自己最重要的事
[01:09.74]我拿起麦克风 你就确保
[01:11.05]我能被人群看到就好了
[01:12.50]兄弟 我的打扮很不错
[01:14.07]兄弟 这辆豪车还可以
[01:15.44]等一等 冷静点 YoungBoy
[01:16.94]确保我在舞台上尽情表演
[01:18.48]我走了与常人相反的路
[01:19.96]花了十万块买珠宝
[01:21.44]依然在街头与人斗争
[01:23.04]混蛋 不要给我含沙射影
[01:25.11]我离开这里 又霸气回归
[01:27.92]我不会说这一切很容易
[01:31.25]我稍微动动脑筋 我兄弟的货就马上卖光 谁都看不到我
[01:34.07]我本来可以让他自生自灭
[01:37.19]我稍微帮点忙 他一出手就能赢
[01:39.92]我需要找个情人 让这些女人远离我家大门
[01:42.95]我带我的女人回到家里 直到她们都走了为止 兄弟
[01:46.30]只要我们还在 他们就一定会恨我们 这是朋友给我说的
[01:49.15]我从来不会看她一眼 她唱了我的歌 兄弟
[01:52.08]给她买了劳力士 给她订了飞机票 送她回家去
[01:54.82]她发来的短信收不到回信 把我新女友的照片发出来
[01:56.57]然后关掉手机
[01:58.18]拿出你的手机 拍拍我脖子上的金链子 碧池 仔细看着
[02:01.51]我离开这里 又霸气回归
[02:04.32]我不会说这一切很容易
[02:07.57]我稍微动动脑筋 我兄弟的货就马上卖光 谁都看不到我
[02:10.48]我本来可以让他自生自灭
